function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of specificity in accounting for recovery time in the formulation of resilience metrics","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of recovery capabilities and potential overestimation of resilience","Mitigation":"Include recovery time in the formulation of resilience metrics to provide a more comprehensive assessment of system resilience","Technologies":"Resilience assessment tools and modeling software","People":"Risk assessors, urban planners, and infrastructure managers","Owner":"Risk assessors, resilience experts, and infrastructure managers"},{"Description":"Resilience metric that does not consider time to recover, leading to inaccurate assessment","Impact":"Failure to account for the duration of recovery, potential underestimation of resilience, and inadequate preparedness for extended recovery periods","Mitigation":"Modify the resilience metric to incorporate the time to recover, providing a more accurate assessment of system resilience","Technologies":"Resilience assessment tools and modeling software","People":"Risk assessors, safety managers, and resilience experts","Owner":"Risk assessors, resilience experts, and safety managers"},{"Description":"Inadequate safety indicator measurement for public transportation systems' resilience assessment","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of system resilience and potential safety risks due to ineffective safety management perspective","Mitigation":"Enhance the safety indicator measurement method to better capture factors affecting system safety, ensuring a more comprehensive resilience assessment","Technologies":"Safety management software, data analytics tools","People":"Safety managers, transportation planners, and infrastructure safety experts","Owner":"Public transportation authorities and safety management agencies"}]}
